Title: Association Rules Mining for Identifying Popular Ingredients on YouTube Cooking Recipes Videos
Source title: 1st 2018 Indonesian Association for Pattern Recognition International Conference, INAPR 2018 - Proceedings
Affiliations: Informatics Study Program, School of Creative Technology Bina Nusantara Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Siswanto, B., Informatics Study Program, School of Creative Technology Bina Nusantara Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia; Thariqa, P., Informatics Study Program, School of Creative Technology Bina Nusantara Bandung, Bandung, Indonesia
Abstract: YouTube provides a lot of videos that will be able to create dataset. YouTube video has some characteristics on number of views, likes, dislikes and comments. Association rules mining able to find the most dominant item in a dataset. This research investigates 40 random videos on YouTube by implementing association rules mining algorithm to find what is the most ingredients used in Indonesia cooking recipes. This research found that the most liked video use 2 main ingredient which are garlic and onion. This research also implements IST-EFP algorithm for reducing the dimensional of the dataset without loss on important rules obtained. This research found IST-EFP able to reduce 19% on dataset dimension with 0.7% loss on rules obtained. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: association rule mining; cooking recipes ingredients; IST-EFP algorithm; YouTube dataset
Index Keywords: Association rules; Data mining; Pattern recognition; Websites; Association rules mining; Cooking recipe; Indonesia; Number of views; YouTube; Cooking
